title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: The current implementation of BidiUtil in win32 relies on Class.forName() usage.
OB: The code uses Class.forName() to obtain the class of BidiUtil, which might result in runtime errors and is considered unsafe.
EB:
Modify the code to use a direct instantiation of BidiUtil, as shown below:

```java
static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil(), "windowProc", 4);
```
SR: Please update the code to use direct instantiation of BidiUtil instead of relying on Class.forName() to ensure safer and more reliable behavior. While I haven't tested it, the suggested modification is expected to achieve the same functionality.
